Key Match Events: Roston Chase and Andre Russell's sixth-wicket stand helped West Indies chase the target
West Indies had a jitter in the run chase as they lost five wickets for 97 runs and needed 40 off the last four overs
Brandon King scored 29-ball 34 while Nicholas Pooran made 27-ball 27
Miscellaneous Highlights: West Indies defeated Papua New Guinea by five wickets in the second match of the T20 World Cup 2024
The only notable partnership PNG had was of Sese Bau and Charles Amini for the fifth wicket where they scored 44 runs
Others: Skipper Assad Vala took two wickets for the PNG by giving away 28 runs
Kiplin Doriga (27*) chipped in with some vital runs at the backend to take the total to 136/8
